targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  TIMESTAMP(date), 
  SUM(m_visits) as m_visits
  FROM Piano.total_visits
  WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" 
  AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen" 
  AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel" 
  AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" 
  AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')
  GROUP BY date

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Visits')), 'Visits')
FROM(
SELECT 'Visits' as Visits
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Bounce Rate in %')), 'Bounce Rate in %')
FROM(
SELECT 'Bounce Rate in %' as Bounce
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Page Views / Visits')), 'Page Views / Visits')
FROM(
SELECT 'Page Views / Visits' as pi_visits
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Time spent/Visit in s')), 'Time spent/Visit in s')
FROM(
SELECT 'Time spent/Visit in s' as Audio_Videostarts
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Audio- & Videostarts')), 'Audio- & Videostarts')
FROM(
SELECT 'Audio- & Videostarts' as Audio_Videostarts
)

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_bounce_rate*m_visits,0))/SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0))*100 as summe,
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
--AND ${ZeitraumNew:raw} 
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date:iso}') AND DATE('${__to:date:iso}')

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_page_loads,0))/SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,1)) as PI_per_visit,
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date:iso}') AND DATE('${__to:date:iso}')

SELECT
  SUM(m_visits * m_time_spent_per_visits/1000) / SUM(m_visits) AS time_spent
FROM 
  Piano.total_visits
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date:iso}') AND DATE('${__to:date:iso}')

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')
-- and av_content_type = "video"

WITH nachrichten AS (
  SELECT 
  CASE page_chapter2 WHEN "thueringen" THEN "Thüringen" WHEN "sachsen" THEN "Sachsen" WHEN "sachsen-anhalt" THEN "Sachsen-Anhalt" WHEN "deutschland" THEN "Deutschland" WHEN "welt" THEN "Welt" END as Chapter,
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
  FROM Piano.total_visits
  WHERE page_chapter1 = "nachrichten" AND page_chapter2 IN ("sachsen","sachsen-anhalt","thueringen","deutschland","welt") AND site_level2 = "$LRA" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')
  GROUP BY Chapter
), ratgeber AS(
  SELECT 
  "Ratgeber" as Chapter,
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
  FROM Piano.total_visits
  WHERE page_chapter1 = "ratgeber" AND site_level2 = "$LRA" AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')
  GROUP BY Chapter
--), app_aktuell AS (
--  SELECT
--  "App Aktuell" as Chapter,
--  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
--  FROM Piano.total_visits
--  WHERE page_chapter1 = "nachrichten" AND page_chapter2 IN ("app_aktuell","app-aktuell") AND site_level2 = "$LRA" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND $Zeitraum
), ndr_kapitel as (
  SELECT CASE page_chapter1 WHEN "nachrichten" THEN "Nachrichten" WHEN "kultur" THEN "Kultur" WHEN "sport" THEN "Sport" WHEN "geschichte" THEN "Geschichte" WHEN "ratgeber" THEN "Ratgeber" END as Chapter,
  SUM(COALESCE(m_visits,0)) as summe
  FROM Piano.total_visits
  WHERE   site_level2 = "$LRA" AND page_chapter1 IN ("geschichte","kultur","nachrichten","ratgeber","sport") AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel" AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung" AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')
  GROUP BY Chapter ), mdr as(
 SELECT * FROM(
SELECT
Chapter,
summe FROM nachrichten
UNION ALL
SELECT
Chapter,
summe FROM ratgeber
--UNION ALL 
--SELECT
--Chapter,
--summe FROM app_aktuell
))
SELECT DISTINCT 
CASE WHEN "$LRA" = "ndr.de" THEN ndr_kapitel.Chapter
WHEN "$LRA" = "mdr.de" THEN mdr.Chapter END as Chapter,
CASE WHEN "$LRA" = "ndr.de" THEN ndr_kapitel.summe
WHEN "$LRA" = "mdr.de" THEN mdr.summe END as summe 
FROM mdr,ndr_kapitel
ORDER BY summe desc

SELECT
publishing_date, 
content_titel,
sum(m_visits) as visits,
sum(m_page_loads) as page_views,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_bounce_rate*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS bounce_rate,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits,
CASE WHEN SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0))>0 THEN SUM(m_homepage_anteil_visits*m_visits)/SUM(IFNULL(m_visits,0)) ELSE -1 END AS m_homepage_anteil_visits,
CASE 
  WHEN "$Redaktionen" = "Alle Kapitel 1"  THEN page_chapter1 
  WHEN "$Redaktionen" = "nachrichten"  THEN page_chapter2 
END AS Kapitel,
content_id_sophora, url
FROM
(
SELECT
FIRST_VALUE(publishing_date) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as publishing_date, 
FIRST_VALUE(content_id_sophora) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_id_sophora, 
page_chapter2, page_chapter1,
m_visits,
m_page_loads,
m_bounce_rate,
m_suchmaschinen_anteil_visits,
m_homepage_anteil_visits, 
FIRST_VALUE(url) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as url, 
FIRST_VALUE(content_titel) OVER (PARTITION BY uuid ORDER BY publishing_date DESC) as content_titel, 
FROM 
Piano.articles_joined
WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(page_chapter1_tags) 
AND "$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%verteilseite%'
AND content_id_sophora NOT LIKE '%nachrichtenfeed%'
AND page_chapter1 NOT LIKE "CONT"
AND objekt_typ NOT LIKE 'indexPage'
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')) 
GROUP BY content_id_sophora, content_titel, publishing_date, page_chapter2, page_chapter1, url, publishing_date ORDER BY 4 DESC 

LIMIT 100

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Audio')), '')
FROM(
SELECT 'Audio' as Audio
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Wiedergaben')), 'Wiedergaben')
FROM(
SELECT 'Wiedergaben' as Wiedergaben
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Wiedergaberate')), 'Wiedergaberate')
FROM(
SELECT 'Wiedergaberate' as Wiedergaberate
)

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Video')), 'Video')
FROM(
SELECT 'Video' as Video
)

-- SELECT 
--   SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as summe
-- FROM 
--   Piano.av
-- WHERE 
-- site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
-- "$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
-- "$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
-- AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
-- AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')
-- AND av_content_type = "Video" or av_content_type = "video"  
SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')
AND av_content_type = "video"

SELECT
  SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) / SUM(m_av_playbacks) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND av_content_type = "video"
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT LIKE '%Live%'
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type NOT LIKE '%live%'
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')

SELECT CONCAT(REPEAT(" ", $filled_size_headline - CHAR_LENGTH('Audio')), 'Audio')
FROM(
SELECT 'Audio' as Audio
)

SELECT 
  SUM(COALESCE(m_av_playbacks,0)) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')
-- AND av_content_type = "Audio" or 
AND av_content_type = "audio"

SELECT 
  --AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) as summe
  SUM(m_av_playbacks * m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) / SUM(m_av_playbacks) as summe
FROM 
  Piano.av
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND av_content_type = "audio"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')

SELECT 
bi_av_publication_date,
bi_av_content, bi_av_content_id,
bi_av_url as url,
sum(m_av_playbacks) as wiedergabe,
CONCAT(CONCAT(

  CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String)  END ,

  ":",CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String)  END)," Min") as av_content_duration,
ROUND(AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate),4) wiedergaberate,
av_content_type,
bi_av_broadcasting_type,
--device_type,
FROM
(
SELECT
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_publication_date) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_publication_date, 
m_av_playbacks,
CAST(av_content_duration/1000 AS INT) as av_content_duration,
m_av_average_playback_completion_rate,
av_content_type, bi_av_content_id,
bi_av_broadcasting_type, 
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_url) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_url, 

--device_type,
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_content) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_content, 
FROM 
Piano.av
WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND bi_av_content_id NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type = "ondemand"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')) GROUP BY bi_av_publication_date,bi_av_content,av_content_duration,av_content_type,bi_av_content_id, bi_av_broadcasting_type, bi_av_url
--,device_type 
ORDER BY 5 DESC
Limit 100

panels.title: Top 100 Web Audios & Videos on Demand

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
bi_av_publication_date,
bi_av_content, bi_av_content_id,
bi_av_url as url,
sum(m_av_playbacks) as wiedergabe,
--CONCAT(CONCAT(

 -- CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(DIV(av_content_duration,60) AS String)  END ,

-- ":",CASE WHEN LENGTH(CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String))<2 THEN CONCAT("0",CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String)) ELSE CAST(MOD(av_content_duration,60) AS String)  END)," Min") as av_content_duration,
--AVG(m_av_average_playback_completion_rate) wiedergaberate,
av_content_type,
bi_av_broadcasting_type,
--device_type,
FROM
(
SELECT
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_publication_date) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_publication_date, 

m_av_playbacks,
--CAST(av_content_duration/1000 AS INT) as av_content_duration,
--m_av_average_playback_completion_rate,
av_content_type, bi_av_content_id,
bi_av_broadcasting_type, 
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_url) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_url, 
--device_type,
FIRST_VALUE(bi_av_content) OVER (PARTITION BY bi_av_content_id ORDER BY m_av_playbacks DESC) as bi_av_content, 
FROM 
Piano.av
WHERE site_level2 = "$LRA" AND
"$Redaktionen" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter1_tags) AND
"$Unterkapitel" IN UNNEST(bi_av_page_chapter2_tags)
AND "$Sendung" IN UNNEST(sendungs_id_tags)
AND bi_av_content_id NOT LIKE '%index%'
AND bi_av_broadcasting_type = "live"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}'))
 GROUP BY bi_av_publication_date,bi_av_content,
--av_content_duration,
av_content_type,bi_av_content_id, bi_av_broadcasting_type, bi_av_url
--,device_type 
ORDER BY 5 DESC
Limit 100

SELECT 
  SUM(m_visits), 
  src_referrer_site_domain 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.distro` 
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')
AND src_referrer_site_domain NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
AND CASE WHEN 
      site_level2 = "mdr.de" 
      THEN (distribution = "web" OR distribution ="amp")
      ELSE 1=1 END 
GROUP BY src_referrer_site_domain 
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT 
  SUM(m_visits), 
  device_type 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.distro` 
WHERE 
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')
AND device_type NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
AND CASE WHEN 
      site_level2 = "mdr.de" 
      THEN (distribution = "web" OR distribution ="amp")
      ELSE 1=1 END 
GROUP BY device_type 
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT 
  SUM(m_visits), 
  src 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.distro` 
WHERE  
site_level2 = "$LRA"
AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2 = "$Unterkapitel"
AND sendungs_id = "$Sendung"
AND date BETWEEN DATE('${__from:date}') AND DATE('${__to:date}')
AND src NOT LIKE '%N/A%'
AND CASE WHEN 
      site_level2 = "mdr.de" 
      THEN (distribution = "web" OR distribution ="amp")
      ELSE 1=1 END 
GROUP BY src 
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT * 
FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.GoogleTrends.realtime_trends_clean` 
WHERE 
--  category ='Business'
  category = 'Headlines'
--  category = 'Science_Tech'
--  category = 'Sport'
--  category = 'Entertainment'
--  category = 'Health'
AND tmstp = 
  (SELECT MAX(tmstp) 
  FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.GoogleTrends.realtime_trends_clean`)
ORDER BY rank

SELECT
  *
FROM
  `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.GoogleTrends.search_trends_daily`

--timestamp = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 0 DAY) 
WHERE CAST(timestamp as date) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) 
--DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE()\, INTERVAL  1 DAY),
LIMIT
  50

query.rawSql:
SELECT distinct media_house FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA"

SELECT distinct LRA FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles`
ORDER BY LRA ASC

SELECT distinct page_chapter1 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA"
ORDER BY page_chapter1 ASC

SELECT distinct page_chapter2 FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA" AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen"
AND page_chapter2  NOT IN ("app-aktuell", "app_aktuell")
ORDER BY page_chapter2 ASC

SELECT distinct sendungs_id FROM `ndr-code-bi-dashboard.Piano.Profiles`
WHERE LRA = "$LRA" AND page_chapter1 = "$Redaktionen" AND page_chapter2="$Unterkapitel"
ORDER BY sendungs_id ASC

SELECT
CASE
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Heute" THEN 1
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Gestern" THEN 7
WHEN "${Zeitraum:text}" = "Letztes Wochenende" THEN 7
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "7") THEN 7
WHEN CONTAINS_SUBSTR("${Zeitraum:text}", "30") THEN 30 END

--SELECT date_diff(DATE('${__to:date:iso}'), DATE('${__from:date:iso}'), DAY) AS day_count
--CASE day_count = 0
--  1 
--END
SELECT
CASE
    WHEN date_diff(DATE('${__to:date:iso}'), DATE('${__from:date:iso}'), DAY) = 0 THEN 1
    ELSE date_diff(DATE('${__to:date:iso}'), DATE('${__from:date:iso}'), DAY)
END;

dashboard.title: Last Month Time Range - Piano Web Desktop
